Body: Memory card is having enough space around 7 GB.then also while downloading apps Google play showing insufficient space. I have tried all the methods like shifting apps from internal storage to memory card,uninstalling futile apps,changing the preferred install location from internal storage to memory card . but then also all in vain. What to do now?? Internal storage is left with a low space around 150 mb.
Title: have enough space on memory card then also google play showing insufficient memory

history.Text: Memory card is having enough space around 7 GB.then also while downloading apps Google play showing insufficient space.
